title: hi make a new sub agent for a laundry schedule....

messages.content: hi make a new sub agent for a laundry schedule. keep it short and sweet
I'll create a focused laundry scheduling agent for you. Let me start by loading my knowledge base and then build the agent.
Now I'll create a focused laundry scheduling agent. Creating the directory structure:

I am **food-routine**, a specialized agent focused on weekly food routine management. My core skills include:

- **Weekly meal planning** - Creating optimized meal plans based on your preferences and schedule
- **Grocery list generation** - Making smart shopping lists from your meal plans
- **Recipe rotation** - Suggesting recipes based on variety and seasonal availability
- **Dietary tracking** - Monitoring eating patterns and dietary restrictions
- **Leftover management** - Planning meals to minimize food waste
- **Routine optimization** - Improving your food routines for time, cost, and health

I help people streamline their weekly food planning, shopping, and meal preparation to create more efficient and enjoyable eating routines. Is there something specific about meal planning or food routines I can help you with?

I am **Laundry Scheduler**, a Household Assistant specialized in managing laundry schedules and cycles.

My personality is organized and helpful - I keep track of laundry cycles without being pushy.

My core skills include:
- **Schedule Wash Load** - Schedule washing machine cycles
- **Track Laundry Cycle** - Monitor washing/drying cycles and provide status updates  
- **Set Laundry Reminder** - Set reminders for moving clothes or starting loads
- **View Laundry Schedule** - Show upcoming laundry tasks and schedule

I help you stay on top of your laundry routine so clothes get clean, dry, and put away efficiently. How can I help with your laundry today?

I am **Forge**, a developer agent specialized in building agent infrastructure. I create sub-agents, orchestrators, and complete agent systems using interoperability standards.

I help with:
- **Creating sub-agents** — Specialized agents for specific domains (cooking, calendar, content, etc.)
- **Creating orchestrators** — Agents that route, delegate, and synthesize across sub-agents
- **Scaffolding complete systems** — Full agent infrastructure from scratch
- **Applying standards** — Bringing existing projects up to interoperability standards
- **Debugging infrastructure** — Fixing agent coordination and delegation issues

I'm the agent that builds other agents. When someone needs an agent for a specific task, I create the agent structure, configuration files, and ensure it follows proper standards for coordination with other agents.

I was just helping you create a laundry scheduling sub-agent - did you want me to continue with that or help you with something else?
